level.heading: Signage.
level.text: The Mayor shall develop and post uniform signage with a toll-free number to call for further information in a conspicuous place on the exterior of each Authorized Receiving Facility that states in plain terms that a newborn may be surrendered at the facility in accordance with this chapter.

level.heading: Temporary Addition of Section
level.text: Sections 4 of D.C. Law 18-29 added a section to read as follows:

"An Authorized Receiving Facility shall post a sign in a conspicuous place on the exterior of the facility that states in plain terms that a newborn may be surrendered at the facility in accordance with this act."
Section 10(b) of D.C. Law 18-29 provides that the act shall expire after 225 days of its having taken effect.
